item.name: Create New Template Success Design Template

exec: pm.test("Status code should be ok 200", function () {
pm.expect(jsonData.entity.title).to.eql('Postman Test Design Template - Generate UUIDs Containers');

request.description: Create a new template successfully, the template is a design one, this is to test the updateUUIDofContainers method, that will assign the uuid to the container according to the number of times the container is present in the template.
